http://tubagames.net/barfight_manifest.p.name: BarFight
http://tubagames.net/barfight_manifest.p.description: BarFight is set in a 1950's Hollywood Western movie set - where the extras compete to impress the director as the inevitable bar fight breaks out. The game is an MMO and a chat room. You can meet up with your friends, chat, play a round of poker, listen to the piano player as you watch the dancing girls...oh...and smash each other over the head with chairs of course! All in glorious third person perspective (also in actual 3D if you bring your own glasses!). The wardrobe department lets you customize your character and set your stats.

http://www.paulbrunt.co.uk/steamcube/man.name: Steamcube
http://www.paulbrunt.co.uk/steamcube/man.description: A simple 2.5D brain teaser block puzzle game. Find out how far can you get before time runs out?

http://hakim.se/experiments/html5/sketch.name: Sketch
http://hakim.se/experiments/html5/sketch.description: Draw sketches with animating lines in pseudo 3D

http://sinuousgame.com/manifest.webapp.name: Sinuous
http://sinuousgame.com/manifest.webapp.description: Avoid the red dots in this fun and addictive game.

http://raptjs.com/manifest.webapp.name: Robots Are People Too
http://raptjs.com/manifest.webapp.description:
RAPT is a complex and challenging HTML5 platformer.  The exit to each level is blocked by enemies that roll, jump, fly, and shoot to prevent escape at all costs.  Gameplay is exclusively two-player and uses a unique split-screen mechanic.  The levels and enemies are designed to promote cooperation between players.

RAPT also comes with a powerful level editor which allows players to create levels of any size.  Levels are saved to the player's account on the server, which has a public page listing custom levels.  Link to this page to share your levels with friends.

http://www.limejs.com/roundball.webapp.name: Roundball
http://www.limejs.com/roundball.webapp.description: Roundball is a fun match three puzzle game where you form horizontal or vertical lines of at least three similar objects by swapping two adjacent items. The more matches you make, the higher your score. Two game modes: Classic and Timed mode. Works on regular computer or on touchscreens.

http://shazow.net/linerage/gameon/manife.name: LineRage
http://shazow.net/linerage/gameon/manife.description: You are a line. Don't hit things.

http://www.limejs.com/zlizer.webapp.name: Zlizer
http://www.limejs.com/zlizer.webapp.description: Slice or join quicly! Simple and entertaining math game. Add or divide quickly to get magic number as the numbers fall, or you'll lose! It's speed math! Works on regular computer or on touchscreens.

http://regamez.com/madtanks/mozilla.weba.name: Mad Tanks TD
http://regamez.com/madtanks/mozilla.weba.description: Tower Defense game. In the future war will be fought by automated tanks. But something went wrong with the A.I. and now you have to defend against them. There are 20 bases to defend. Killing all tanks gives you a perfect win. Please read in-game help for keyboard shortcuts. IE is not supported, it works, but poorly.

http://appmanifest.org/manifest.webapp.name: Manifest Checker
http://appmanifest.org/manifest.webapp.description: A development tool and demonstration app that helps you check your open web app manifests.

http://www.phoboslab.org/ztype/manifest..name: Z-Type
http://www.phoboslab.org/ztype/manifest..description: A Space Shoot'em'up where you type to shoot.

http://www.davesgalaxy.com/site_media/mo.name: Dave's Galaxy
http://www.davesgalaxy.com/site_media/mo.description: Conquer the Galaxy in less than 10 Minutes a Day
